item.title: Framework for doing a Root Cause Analysis
item.description: Most of us would have at some point in time would have been asked to do RCA and provide a report. There are a couple of approaches like Fish Bone and 5 why’s which are often used for this. These approaches worked very well for most of the problems I was trying to solve. Most of my RCAs were related to system outages, bugs in code, process conformance, and equipment failure.
